overview:
ABUS August Bremicker SÃ¶hne KG develops and produces security products for security for the property. It offers systems for tilt and closed windows, window bar locks, window handle locks, combination locks, 2nd fit locks, double casement locks, side hinge units, telescopic rods, skylight locks, locking handles, roller shutters, reinforced bolt locks, security chains, door cylinders, door fittings, door closers, padlocks, hasps, key rings, alarm systems, video surveillance products, container locks, motorbike security products, bicycle security products, ATV/quad products, outdoor products, and marine products. The company serves Europe, North and Central America, Africa, and Australia markets.

ABUS August Bremicker SÃ¶hne KG was founded in 1924 and is based in Wetter, Germany.
